com.shsrobotics.reinforcementlearning.optimizers

Class Optimizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.shsrobotics.reinforcementlearning.optimizers.Optimizer

  • public abstract class Optimizer
extends java.lang.Object
    Optimize coordinates based on a Pattern Search algorithm. To use this class, classes must extend it and provide a double f(double[] input) method. Method calls should be made to minimize() and maximize() only. Other members are public only for extension and implementation purposes.
    Author:
    Team 2412.

      A data point.

    • Field Detail

      • n

        private final int n
        The number of variables to optimize. Data dimensions.

      • iterations

        private final int iterations
        How many times to run the algorithm

      • minimums

        private final double[] minimums
        Minimum variable values. Used to choose random starting points.

      • maximums

        private final double[] maximums
        Maximum Variable values. Used to choose random starting points.

      • PatternSearchStep

        private double PatternSearchStep
        Step size for Pattern Search algorithm. Defaults to ten percent of average variable range.

      • InitialStep

        private double InitialStep
        Stores the default search step size. Defaults to ten percent of average variable range.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Optimizer

        public Optimizer(int iterations,
         double[] minimums,
         double[] maximums)
        Create an optimizer.
        Parameters:
        dimension - the number of variables.
        iterations - how precise to maximize.
        minimums - the minimum domain values.
        maximums - the maximum domain values.

    • Method Detail

      • maximize

        public double[] maximize()
        Maximize the fitness function output for a set of coordinates.
        Returns:
        the maximized coordinates.

      • minimize

        public double[] minimize()
        Minimize the fitness function output for a set of coordinates.
        Returns:
        the minimized coordinates.

      • psOptimize

        private double[] psOptimize(boolean maximize)
        Uses a Pattern Search algorithm to find the coordinates that maximize the function.
        Parameters:
        maximize - whether or not to maximize or minimize. If set to true, the method will maximize.
        Returns:
        the maximized coordinates.

      • better

        private boolean better(double a,
             double b,
             boolean maximize)
        Find which double is better. Whether or not a variable is better is determined by the maximize parameter.
        Parameters:
        a - the first value to test.
        b - the second value to test.
        maximize - whether or not to test if a > b. If false, tests for a < b.
        Returns:
        True if a is better than b.

      • rands

        private double[] rands()
        Fill an array with random values.
        Returns:
        The array.

      • f

        public abstract double f(double[] input)
        Run the fitness function.
        Parameters:
        input - the input values (domain).
        Returns:
        the result (range).
